list.abs: ...食蟹狐（学名：Cerdocyon thous），又名食蟹胡狼，是一类中等身型的犬科动物，分布于南美洲中部。它们是现存食蟹狐属下唯一种，另一种是更新世已灭绝的C. avius。== 分布及栖息地 ==食蟹狐分布自哥伦比亚及委内瑞拉南部至巴拉圭].

Scripture And I will put enmity between thee and the woman and between thy seed and her seed ; it shall bruise thy head and thou shalt bruise his heel ( Genesis 3 : 15 ) .经文：「我又要叫你和女人彼此为仇；你的后裔和女人的后裔，也彼此为仇。女人的后裔要伤你的头，你要伤他的脚跟。」（创世记三：15。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English thu, of Germanic origin; related to German du, from an Indo-European root shared by Latin tu

entry.tran: 你，汝，尔(旧用词，现亦用于诗歌或宗教类语境，用作主语)
entry.def: Thou is an old-fashioned, poetic, or religious word for 'you' when you are talking to only one person. It is used as the subject of a verb.

means.word_mean: 1. the cardinal number that is the product of 10 and 100
